title: Oubliette
description: Reychel thought she was finally free. She was wrong. Everyone saw her gift of prophecy as a blessing, but her gift is uncontrollable. No one alive can teach her to manipulate her unique gift and the answers she needs lie buried within a madman’s journals. She’s thrust in the midst of a brewing war and the only uniting factor for her people is their belief in the Prophet.Will Reychel learn to control her gift or will she be forced to deliver a false prophecy that could lead her people into a violent war?
author: Megg Jensen
